name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 31, Nanjing, Jiangsu, several business districts in Nanjing issued a notice that there would be no New Year's Eve activities and that balloons and Kongming lanterns were prohibited. 
A man bought a batch of balloons before the New Year, expecting them to sell well on New Year's Eve, but because of an official notice, all the balloons were left in his hands.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 31, in Hefei, Anhui and Pingdingshan, Henan, vendors were handcuffed and taken away by several police officers while selling fireworks on the roadside.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 31, in Liaoning, a couple driving a truck knelt down and kowtowed to the police, begging them to let them go.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On the evening of December 31, 24, even though Nanjing sent out multiple notices to cancel New Year's Eve events, blocked multiple pedestrian roads, and deployed a large number of police and even military forces, it still couldn't stop the enthusiasm of citizens to participate in the New Year's Eve. A large number of citizens ignored the dissuasion and still went to Xinjiekou to participate in the New Year's Eve event. Many vendors violated the notice prohibiting the sale of balloons and sold balloons. At midnight on January 1, 2025, the sky was full of balloons.
2025 Happy New YearğŸ¥³

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, Mozambique was in turmoil, and a large number of Chinese businesses, including the agricultural demonstration center built with Chinese aid, were looted. Many Chinese people prepared pistols and incendiary bombs for self-defense. However, the embassy did not organize the evacuation of overseas Chinese, and the mainstream media did not report it.
Pink bloggers cleaned up:
I expect that some people will ask "Why not evacuate overseas Chinese?" We must realize that if we rashly evacuate overseas Chinese when encountering similar situations, the wealth accumulated by many Chinese people who have worked hard overseas will be wiped out.
I would like to ask, facing such consequences, can you accept it? Frequent evacuation of overseas Chinese not only makes personal overseas interests lose protection, but also may make the achievements of many years of entrepreneurship handed over to others.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Some netizens warned on Weibo that Chinese people should not reveal their identities easily, because the movies are all lies and there is no such thing as an all-powerful magic shield. Of course, those who can do business there should not believe in the Wolf Warriors.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Pink blogger "Captain Crow" justified the failure to evacuate Chinese citizens by saying that the embassy had issued a security warning in a timely manner, and that Chinese citizens who started businesses in the local area quickly formed a self-defense force. "Frequent evacuations will wipe out the wealth accumulated by Chinese people who have worked hard overseas, and return them to poverty."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 29, a car crashed into the Fuxing East Road Tunnel in Shanghai, which crosses the Huangpu River, causing a large amount of water leakage.
The official report said: A BMW car crashed into the wall of the upper tunnel, damaging the firefighting facilities, causing a large amount of water leakage, but no casualties.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Recently, an informed netizen exposed the quality problems of Humen Bridge and Taiping Viaduct under the video related to the fake concrete of Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge. The netizen said: I am in the steel bar class. During the construction, 10 cm round steel was stretched to 8 cm, and 8 cm was stretched to 6 cm. The toughness and hardness of the stretched round steel are much worse than the round steel of the same specification. It can be seen that many buildings and bridges collapsed in China are well-founded. The Humen Bridge he reported had abnormal overall shaking of the bridge deck in 2020.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Huizhou, Guangdong Province: A netizen claimed that at 6pm on December 31, he was suddenly asked to rectify the gas pipeline before New Year's Day (within 6 hours), otherwise the gas supply would be cut off. The cabinet that was required to be rectified was installed under the supervision of the gas company that year. The pipe was not in the sealed cabinet at all. An open passage was specially opened and not closed. After the other party found that the facts could not be argued, he directly said: You see, if you want to change it, change it, if not, the gas supply will be cut off.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On the evening of December 31, at Nanjing Xinjiekou, the police asked citizens to stay away from the core area near the Sun Yat-sen statue during the clearing process, and had disputes with citizens during the clearing process.
But even though they were prohibited from going to the core area near the Sun Yat-sen statue in Xinjiekou to celebrate the New Year, tens of thousands of citizens, although they could not accompany Mr. Sun, still hid in the streets to celebrate the New Year, counted down together and released balloons.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Supplement: Last year, during the 2023 New Year's Eve, the pictures and videos of the New Year's Eve near the Sun Yat-sen statue

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Netizen contribution: New Year's Eve citizens set off firecrackers to celebrate, police ran to catch people

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Recently, Weibo trending search: A party secretary of Wujin District, Changzhou, posted indecent remarks in a group, and the group was subsequently disbanded. The local discipline inspection commission said that they are investigating the relevant situation.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 31, 24, several banks announced that they would pay their executives 23 years of salary, and one bank executive was paid 2.7 million yuan.
But at the same time, many banks frequently cut their employees' salaries and forced them to resign.

content: Minsheng Bank, which took the lead in reissuing the chairman's salary, also issued an announcement to recover the performance salary of the entire bank in 2023.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 31, Shandong. A man was taken away by the police for setting off fireworks on the bridge.
On January 1, several police officers rushed into the crowd to arrest citizens who set off fireworks. One man was pinned to the ground by the police, and another man was taken away by the police.
January 1, Henan. A man set off fireworks on the street and was pinned to the ground by several police officers.
December 31, Tianjin. A woman in ancient costume danced on the roadside and was stopped by the police.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Netizen contribution: On the evening of December 31, 24, in Taiyuan, Shanxi, many fires broke out in the city due to fireworks.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On New Year's Eve on December 31, Wanda Plaza, Binhe, Linyi, Shandong Province 
It was reported online that an AIDS patient randomly stabbed people with a needle containing poison. A screenshot of a comment claimed that his classmate was stabbed, and another comment said that a police car went to catch the person who stabbed people with a needle 
But these comments could not confirm the truth of the incident

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 1, citizens of Dongguan, Guangdong, gathered at the Lotus Pond Impression Scenic Area to celebrate New Year's Eve. However, the New Year's Eve fireworks show promised by the organizer was temporarily cancelled, which aroused dissatisfaction among tourists. Angry tourists smashed the ticket center and then sang the national anthem to defend their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 31, Jiangsu Jiangyin Netizens posted a video on Douyin to report that auxiliary police violated the law by wearing traffic police uniforms, illegally wearing police equipment and badges, and illegally enforcing the law without the accompaniment of police officers and issuing tickets.
Later, Jiangyin traffic police called to delete the Douyin video
According to Article 36 of the Police Law, police signs, uniforms, and police equipment are for the exclusive use of people's police. Auxiliary police are not people's police, and using police names and signs and police equipment is illegal
Enforcing the law alone without police supervision is even more illegal

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Netizen contribution: At 1 a.m. on January 1, at the Miaoling Road subway station in Qingdao, citizens climbed over the gate to enter the subway in order to go home. There were no police or staff on the scene, and the situation was out of control.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 31st, suspected to be from Wuhan (based on the license plate) When everyone was celebrating the New Year, a migrant worker in an office building had been asking for wages for two weeks, and on New Year's Eve he jumped off the roof to demand his wages. A fire-fighting air cushion was placed on the scene.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: At the end of 2024, a long queue of petitioners formed in front of the luxurious city government in Langfang City.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The WHO continues to urge China to share Covid-19 origin data after five years, and the WHO said: "This is a moral and scientific imperative. Without transparency, sharing and cooperation among countries, the world will not be able to adequately prevent and respond to future epidemics and pandemics." 
The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs responded: China has shared the most COVID-19 data and research results with the international community, and China is also the only country that has organized experts to share the progress of tracing the origin with the WHO many times.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, the People's Daily launched a collection activity for "Sino-US Friendly Cooperation Stories".
So some netizens recommended the following stories:
"The American middle class lives worse than Chinese migrant workers" (author Zhang Weiwei)
"America is rotten" (author Sima Nan) "America has collapsed" (author Jin Canrong)...
The post has been deleted.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, CCTV reported that people have been spreading rumors online about giant pandas in the United States being abused.
CCTV reported last year that "the living conditions of giant pandas living abroad are very different"
Netizen: "It seems that the official started this trend first"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On the eve of the New Year 2025, Zelensky announced a prisoner exchange, one of the largest prisoner exchanges since the full-scale war with Russia three years ago. 189 Ukrainian soldiers were brought home from captivity, and 150 Russian soldiers were repatriated to Russia.
The video shows a Ukrainian girl crying uncontrollably when she sees her father who was captured by the Russian army and successfully returned home. She thought she would never see her father again.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, many places across the country have issued notices that business districts will not hold New Year's Eve events. The large screens in many shopping malls have been turned off long before the New Year arrives, and people are welcoming the New Year in front of the black large screens.
Video 1: Wangfujing Shopping Mall in Beijing
Video 2: Xinjiekou Shopping District in Nanjing.
Video 3: Xinyuan International Shopping Mall in Guangdong.
Video 4: Lanxiucheng Shopping Mall in Hunan.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 1, the Interim Measures for the Implementation of the Flexible Retirement System were released.
According to the decision: Starting from January 1, 2025, my country will gradually delay the statutory retirement age for male employees from 60 to 63 over 15 years.
The statutory retirement age for female employees will be delayed from 50 and 55 to 55 and 58 respectively.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 31, in Hubei, a cycling enthusiast posted a message saying that he had planned a cycling route for New Year's Eve and posted it on a social platform. However, after only 670 views, he received a call from the police and was asked to delete the post.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 31 (Release), Shanghai. At 9:50 p.m., a teacher at Minhang Middle School East Campus used a loud speaker to lecture students on the playground.
An old man who was disturbed shouted at the teacher in dialect from upstairs: "What the hell is it? The speaker is so loud!"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 31, Russia's top shaman said that 2025 will be a bumper year for Russia and there will be no natural disasters.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 26, CCTV reported: The Gaza Strip was cold in winter, causing a baby girl to freeze to death. A refugee named Fassih fled to southern Gaza due to the war. They left without taking anything with them. The weather was getting colder, but there were not many warm clothes. However, some netizens found that the refugee was suspected of wearing a duckbill cap sold on Taobao for about 279 yuan, and data showed that the highest temperature in Gaza in recent days was around 18 degrees.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Netizens expressed doubts about this.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 1, after the Taipei City Governmentâ€™s New Yearâ€™s Eve Party ended, people discovered that the big screen was broadcasting the content of China Central Televisionâ€™s Party and other programs. Some Chinese netizens joked that â€œChiang Wan-an is getting bolder and bolderâ€, while Taiwanese people questioned the Taipei governmentâ€™s intention in broadcasting these images.
Mainland Affairs Council: It is extremely inappropriate, and the relevant units should be held responsible, apologize and review.
Taipei Tourism Bureau: This is a serious negligence of the staff, and will be handled and held accountable in accordance with the contract.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 31 (Release) Putin had previously signed a presidential decree to issue enlistment bonuses in order to solve the problem of recruiting soldiers. For this reason, many prison inmates also joined the Russian army. However, due to economic difficulties, Russia passed a resolution on December 28 to deprive these prisoners of their enlistment bonuses.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, Shanghai issued a military service registration notice, and the military service registration targets include citizens of military age and citizens of college age.
Citizens of military age who do not participate in the military service registration that year cannot be recommended or determined as pre-recruitment targets, cannot be recruited into the army, and relevant departments cannot accept their applications for employment, schooling, leaving the country, and handling industrial and commercial business licenses, and they will be included in the list of serious dishonest persons in the field of national defense.
Netizen: In prosperous times, they squeeze their bodies, and in wartime, they use their lives

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Citizens gathered at the Bund in Shanghai to celebrate the New Year, but nothing happened after the countdown, and there were no fireworks.
The photographer said he was "challenging the most embarrassing New Year's Eve in the country"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The Russian military reportedly complained about the extremely poor quality of electronic equipment received from China. Reports from Russian troops currently stationed on the front lines in Ukraine highlight the growing frustration of Russian experts with the quality of Chinese-made electronic warfare equipment, especially electronic jammers.
They report that they are often faced with situations where defective components are included in the equipment they receive, and poor construction quality hinders the implementation of military operations

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 31, Jiangsu. A man set off fireworks near a bridge and was choked and pushed by the police, and then taken into a police car.
December 31, Shandong. After setting off fireworks, the man was taken away by the police.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 31, Beijing issued a notice to raise the upper age limit for housing provident fund loans to 68 years old.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: January 1 (Released) Russia connected several rifles together, and a North Korean soldier praised it. He said this weapon is so good that it can shoot down Ukrainian drones. If North Korea had this weapon earlier, it could occupy the United States.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 31 (Released) A registration form for an interview at Shenzhen Hemingway Technology Company was circulated online, asking whether employees could accept unpaid overtime and delay the payment of commissions.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 31, lawyer Cai Ya posted a video saying that his client was a cadre who was detained for committing a crime, but he has now given up and does not want to find a lawyer to defend him. The client said that although his case was a wrongful case, he was in the system and knew the rules of the system, so he did not want to cause trouble to his family and had to give up. Lawyer Cai Ya said, "As a cadre who has given up, you can feel that many cases nowadays are indeed made up by force."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 28, Shenzhen Youer Garment Factory issued a notice: Due to major changes in European and American policies, the company's clothing export business has suffered an extremely severe impact and its operations are facing huge difficulties. It has decided to suspend work and production, and the resumption date is to be determined.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 30, Zhejiang. Binwang Yating project owes wages to veterans. Workers holding veteran certificates said, "I called 12345, complained to the national wage arrears website, and went to the street office and the labor bureau, but no one has taken care of it."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 31, Weihai, Shandong. A mother said that her child, Sun Jianchao, was studying at Weihai Aluminum Vocational College. He died for no reason while at school, and his body was covered with scars. "I don't know where his two eyeballs are." The body is still in the funeral home. She asked to check the school surveillance, but the school kept making excuses to delay. The mother also said that the forensic doctor identified the cause of death as heart disease, but the child had scratches on his groin, bruises on his lower abdomen, and bloodstains on his shoulders.
